name: Sticky - OHGJ 355
description:
https://onehourgamejam.com/?page=jam&jam=355

Controls : Left/Right Arrow keys to move the Sticky Man

Goal : Avoid the seagull and reach the "Sunset" window while your are climbing down the building

Postmortem : this game was made in about 3hours. I wanted to switch the map scale in-game (x1 and x2) but finally concentrated on the x2 scale with camera movement.
